title: Tour de France stage 14 rocked by two early crashes, Bardet, Chaves, Meintjes abandon
content:
Huge crash in opening 10km forces officials to neutralize the stage for almost 30 minutes, second crash soon after causes more injuries.

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 14 rocked by two early crashes, Bardet, Chaves, Meintjes abandon on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
